parameters.name: On
parameters.description: Value is 1 by default. Changing the value to 0 causes the button to stop emitting lights. This doesn’t prevent the button from activating.

parameters.name: Open
parameters.description: Value is 0 by default and will change depending if the player opens or closes the lid. 0 = closed and 1 = open.

parameters.name: Activate
parameters.description: Value to 0 by default and will change briefly to 1 if the button is pressed and revert to 0 afterward.

parameters.name: Lock
parameters.description: Value is 0 by default. Changing the value to 1 locks the lid into place, preventing the player from opening or closing it.

outputs.name: On
outputs.description: Returns whether the button is emitting lights or not.

outputs.name: Open
outputs.description: Returns whether the lid is open or not.

outputs.name: Power
outputs.description: Same as Lock but Read Only.

outputs.name: PrefabHash
outputs.description: Return the hash id, which is 1668452680.

outputs.name: RequiredPower
outputs.description: Returns the required power. Returns 0 if the button’s light is off and 50 if the light is on.

outputs.name: Setting
outputs.description: Same as Activate but Read Only.

outputs.name: Activate
outputs.description: Returns whether the button is pressed or not.

outputs.name: Lock
outputs.description: Returns whether the lid is locked into place or not.
